pullRequest.title: Support the recursive editing of metadata groups
pullRequest.bodyText:
summarize the code, which had been duplicated by copy&paste
replace the metadata table with a tree table to display recursive metadata groups
adjusts the import so that it works again

commit.message: Display metadata groups recursively using a tree table

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -17,164 +17,17 @@
